column5: There used to be a float plane charter on trout lake in north bay, but for the life of me I can't remember the name of it.  Is anyone familiar with them, and/or know of another in the North Bay area (or callander, nippissing)?
Only have an old float base supplement here at home.. but I have Air North Bay 705-497-8810  Give it a ring and see if it's still works.
